.. pyIsoDep documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Mon Oct  18 16:40:31 2021.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to pyIsoDep's documentation!
====================================

.. only:: html

Python Isotopic Depletion package (Prounounced as *Pie-Eye-zo-dep*) designed to perform transmutation and
decay analysis.


.. admonition:: Preferred citation for attribution
    :class: tip

    Matthew Krecicki, Dan Kotlyar,
    "`Custom Depletion Packackage for Engineering-based analysis
    <https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S002954932030100X>`_,"
    *Nuc. Ann. Eng*, (in preparation) (2021).

   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Contents:

   glossary
